item.title: Tides of Tomorrow adds PS5 and Xbox Series versions, launches February 24, 2026
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/06/tides-of-tomorrow-adds-ps5-and-xbox-series-versions-launches-february-24-2026

  • PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

First-person adventure game from DigixArt dated.

Tides of Tomorrow, a first-person adventure game with a multiplayer influence system, will launch for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam on February 24, 2026, publisher Deep Silver and developer DigixArt announced. The console versions are newly announced.

“Just like in Road 96, narrative is at the heart of the experience,” said game director Adrien Poncet in a press release. “In this ruthless ocean world, you play as Tidewalkers, who witness echoes of other players’ actions. You will have to deal with the consequences of their choices—it’s up to you to cooperate… or to make waves!”

DigixArt producer Kevin Bard added, “In Tides of Tomorrow, for the first time, your story changes based on the players you choose to follow. This innovative twist unlocks a whole new range of possibilities for storytelling and gameplay. Will you follow friends, streamers or total strangers?”

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

From the makers of Road 96, Tides of Tomorrow challenges you to survive the troubled ocean planet of Elynd, as well as the choices made by your friends and favorite streamers.

Elynd

Welcome to Elynd, a world struggling to survive in the wake of the Great Flood. As a deadly plastification threatens to kill all living things, steel yourself to face the numerous challenges posed by this ocean planet. Find a cure, explore floating platforms, or deal with the threats exposed by the community. As you delve deeper into the mysteries of Elynd, you’ll never be alone…

Your Friends Impact Your Story

As you explore Elynd you’ll encounter a diverse cast of characters. Each one has their own moods, motivations and perspectives on the planet’s fortunes. Choose your allies carefully, as every decision has the potential to create new adversaries. Keep one close eye on your friends’ adventures too! Their actions will shape your own story, requiring you to carefully react to an unpredictable world.

Key Features

  • Follow your friends or favorite streamers on their own adventures.
  • Sail through uncertain waters, gathering resources to improve your chances of survival.
  • Explore diverse floating platforms set amongst unique landscapes.
  • Encounter iconic and unforgettable characters ready to help—or hinder—your progress.

item.title: TRIZEAL Remix coming to Switch on June 5
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/06/trizeal-remix-coming-to-switch-on-june-5

  • Switch

TriangleService-developed vertical-scrolling shoot 'em up.

TriangleService will release a Switch version of vertical-scrolling shoot ’em up TRIZEAL Remix on June 5, the developer announced.

TRIZEAL Remix, an enhanced port of the 2004 arcade shoot ’em up TRIZEAL, first launched for PC via Steam on July 7, 2016.

Here is an overview of the game, via its official website:

A classic vertical shoot ’em up, TRIZEAL, originally released in arcades in 2004. Includes a commentary by the developer!

Three buttons (Shot / Transform / Bomb) and three weapons (Wide / Laser / Missile)—use them all to conquer unique stages! This is an ambitious work that aims to revive elements of earlier arcade shooters—such as secret characters hidden in each stage—in the polygon era.

Newly recorded developer commentary talks about:

  • How did the programmer who was bad at math cope with 3D game development?
  • Behind-the-scenes stories that help you learn more about the arcade shmup scene around the year 2000!
